dessert.directions: : In a food processor or blender, combine all ingredients until smooth. Make sure chocolate chips are melted prior to mixing.

dessert.title: Sweet Potato Hash
dessert.ingredients: : 2 medium sweet potatoes, cut into cubes (3 cups) 2 tbsp olive oil ½ tsp ground cumin ½ tsp chili powder ¼ tsp sea salt 1 can of black beans, drained and rinsed 2 tsp lime juice 1 tsp pepper ¼ cup chopped cilantro
dessert.directions: : Preheat oven to 400℉. Prepare a baking sheet. In a large bowl, add 1 tbsp olive oil, cumin, chili powder, and salt. Mix. Add in sweet potatoes and toss until they are coated. Place sweet potatoes on the baking sheet and bake for 25 minutes or until tender. When the sweet potatoes have 5 minutes remaining, add black beans, 1 tsp lime juice, and 1 tbsp olive oil to a medium sized skillet. Mix and let saute for 5 minutes. Add sweet potatoes and other tsp of lime juice to the skillet. Stir to combine. Add cilantro on top. Let it heat for 3 more minutes and enjoy!

dessert.title: Homemade Sweet Potato Fries
dessert.ingredients: : 32 oz sweet potato 1 tbsp olive oil 1 tsp garlic powder 1 tsp sea salt 1 tsp pepper
dessert.directions: : Preheat the oven to 400°F. Cut the sweet potatoes into sticks (1/4 to 1/2 inch wide and 3 inches long) and toss them with the oil. Mix the spices in a small bowl. Toss sweet potatoes in spices. Spread fries out on a baking sheet. Bake for 15 minutes, then flip and finishing cooking for 10 minutes.

dessert.title: Sweet Potato Nachos
dessert.ingredients: 2 large sweet potatoes 1 lb 95% lean ground beef 1 pack of taco seasoning 2 oz low fat cheese (dairy free or regular) 1 c chopped peppers ½ chopped white onion + 1 TBSP olive oil to cook (optional) Toppings 1 avocado (diced) ½ c shredded lettuce
dessert.directions: : 1. Slice sweet potatoes into thin rounds and place evenly on baking sheet. 2. Cook sweet potatoes for 25-30 minutes (or until browned) at 400 degrees F. 3. While sweet potatoes are in oven, (add olive oil and onion to skillet), then add ground beef into onions to cook. Season with taco seasoning of choice 4. Take sweet potato out of oven. 5. Spread ground beef, cheese, and peppers evenly over sweet potato thins. 6. Cook in oven for 5 additional minutes to melt cheese. 7. Take out of oven and add into serving dishes. 8. Top with diced avocado and lettuce. For individuals with IBS, omit onions and choose a taco seasoning without onion or garlic powder. Low amounts of red, yellow, and orange bell peppers are generally low FODMAP. Choose green bell peppers in larger amounts for a low FODMAP choice as well.

dessert.title: Frozen Greek Yogurt Bark
dessert.ingredients: : ½ cup non-fat Plain Greek Yogurt ¼ cup strawberries, sliced 1.5 Tbsp granola
dessert.directions: : Spread Greek yogurt on parchment paper Add sliced strawberries Add granola Freeze until yogurt is firm Remove from freezer, and break into pieces Enjoy!

dessert.title: High Protein Chocolate Pudding
dessert.ingredients: : 5 oz tofu 1/4 c unsweetened almond milk 1 TBSP Cacao 1 TBSP PB powder 1/2 serving vanilla protein of choice 1 tsp maple syrup or date syrup dark chocolate shavings (for topping)
dessert.directions: : Add ingredients to a food processor. Blend until smooth. Serve in a small dish and top with your favorite topping!

dessert.title: High Protein Peanut Butter Cookie Dough
dessert.ingredients: : 1 container nonfat vanilla Greek yogurt (~4-5oz) (can opt for dairy free yogurt) 1/4 c PB Fit powder 1/4-1/2 c oat flour (add additional depending on consistency) 1-2 servings of protein powder or collagen (add additional depending on consistency) 2 TBSP dairy free chocolate chips
dessert.directions: : Mix ingredients together until desired consistency, adding extra flour or protein powder as needed. Store in fridge and enjoy throughout the week.

dessert.title: Bone Broth Hot Chocolate
dessert.ingredients: : 1 cup bone broth 2 TBSP unsweetened cocoa 1 TBSP maple syrup (sub two packets stevia) 1/2 cup soy milk (sub fat free milk) 1/2 tsp cinnamon 2 oz marshmallows (optional) peppermint stick (optional)
dessert.directions: : Heat bone broth, cocoa, maple syrup, soy milk, and cinnamon in a pot on low, stirring to mix ingredients and keep from burning. Top with marshmallows and toss in a peppermint stick for a festive flavor!

dessert.title: Peppermint Chocolate Mousse Parfait
dessert.ingredients: : 1 container vanilla yogurt (sub high protein dairy free yogurt) 1 scoop chocolate protein powder (sub cocoa powder) 1/8 tsp peppermint extract Toppings Gluten Free peppermint Joe Joes (Trader Joes) Smashed peppermint
dessert.directions: : Mix peppermint extract, yogurt, and chocolate protein powder in one bowl. Top with smashed peppermint cookies and peppermint

dessert.title: Candy Cane Crunch Cake
dessert.ingredients: : 1 Rice cake 1 Tbsp Nut butter of choice 2 tsp hemp seeds 11g dark chocolate 1 crushed peppermint
dessert.directions: : Cover rice cake with nut butter. Sprinkle hemp seeds over nut butter. Dip in melted dark chocolate. Sprinkle crushed peppermint on top of melted chocolate. Freeze for 10 minutes.

dessert.title: Ground Turkey Sweet Potato Bake
dessert.ingredients: : 1 lb ground turkey 2 medium sweet potatoes, peeled and diced 2 zucchini, diced 2/3 cup shredded parmesan cheese 1 tsp garlic powder 1 tsp rosemary 5 tbsp olive oil 1/4 tsp salt and pepper
dessert.directions: : Preheat oven to 400°F. Place in a large baking dish and toss the diced sweet potatoes with 2 tbsp olive oil, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp rosemary, salt, and pepper. Bake the sweet potatoes for 30 minutes. While sweet potatoes are in the oven, sauté the ground turkey in a pan with 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 tsp garlic powder, 1/2 tsp rosemary, salt, and pepper. Remove the sweet potato from the oven. Layer the ground turkey and diced zucchini on top of the sweet potatoes. Bake for 10 minutes. Add in an additional 2 tbsp olive oil, mix, and top with the shredded parmesan cheese. Bake for 10 minutes.

dessert.title: Sweet Potato Casserole with Pecan Topping
dessert.directions: : Preheat the Oven: Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C). Cook Sweet Potatoes: Place the sweet potato cubes in a large pot of water and bring to a boil. Cook until the sweet potatoes are tender, about 15-20 minutes. Drain the sweet potatoes and transfer them to a large mixing bowl. Mash Sweet Potatoes: Mash the sweet potatoes with a potato masher or fork until smooth. Add Ingredients to the Filling: Add beaten egg, coconut oil, maple syrup (or honey), cinnamon, nutmeg, almond milk, vanilla extract, and a pinch of salt to the mashed sweet potatoes. Mix well until combined. Prepare the Pecan Topping: In a separate bowl, combine chopped pecans, whole wheat flour, melted coconut oil, maple syrup (or honey), cinnamon, and a pinch of salt. Mix until the pecans are evenly coated. Assemble the Casserole: Transfer the sweet potato mixture to a baking dish, spreading it evenly. Add Pecan Topping: Sprinkle the pecan topping evenly over the sweet potato layer. Bake: Bake in oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the pecan topping is golden brown. Serve: Allow the casserole to cool for a few minutes before serving. #side #recipes #seasonal #Thanksgiving #casserole #holiday #holidaymeal

dessert.title: Apple Crisp Crumble
dessert.ingredients: : Apple Portion: 6 apples 1 tbsp cinnamon dash of salt 2 tsp coconut oil Crumble Portion: 2/3 cup oats 2/3 cup pecans 1 tbsp coconut oil 2 tsp honey
dessert.directions: : Preheat oven to 350°F. Chop the apples and saut é them along with cinnamon, salt, and coconut oil in a pan at medium high heat for 2-3 minutes. In a food processor, mix all crumble ingredients with 1 tbsp of water until throughly combined. Add crumble and apple mixture to a small baking pan and bake for 15-20 minutes.

dessert.title: Chocolate Chip Pumpkin Bread
dessert.ingredients: : Wet Ingredients: 1 cup organic pumpkin purée 1/3 cup maple syrup 1/4 cup coconut oil 1 tsp vanilla extract 3 eggs 1/3 cup creamy almond butter (or cashew butter for sweeter taste) Dry Ingredients: 1 tbsp pumpkin spice 1/4 cup almond flour 3 tbsp oat flour 1 tsp baking soda 1/2 tsp salt 1 scoop unflavored collagen 1/4 cup chocolate chips
dessert.directions: : Mix wet ingredients. Mix dry ingredients in separate bowl. Add dry ingredients into wet ingredients. Mix thoroughly. Pour mixture into parchment lined loaf pan. Sprinkle (or mix in) chocolate chips. Bake for 35-45 minutes on 350 or until fully cooked.
